definition: Huang Tingjian (1045-1105), Song poet and calligrapher
surname Huang or Hwang
yellow/pornographic/to fall through
main hall/front courtyard/law court
strong/solid/firm/unyielding/resolute

sentences.english: All of these artistic characteristics distinguishes him from his contemporary poets.
sentences.chinese: 这是黄庭坚区别于其他诗人的艺术特征。

sentences.english: Besides, some of Huang Tingjian slate works succeeded in learning Taos style.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，晚年的黄庭坚也确有一些学陶的成功之作。

sentences.english: Huang Tingjian is highly of Taoist complex, and his poetic taste comes from his carrying forward the Taoist tradition.
sentences.chinese: 黄庭坚的诗歌趣味来源于对道教传统的继承。

definition: Mi Fu (1051-1107), Song poet and calligrapher

Wen Zhengming (1470-1559), Ming painter, one of Four great southern talents of the Ming 江南四大才子
four famous Song calligraphers, namely: Su Shi 蘇軾|苏轼[Su1 Shi4], Huang Tingjian 黃庭堅|黄庭坚[Huang2 Ting2 jian1], Mi Fu 米芾[Mi3 Fu2] and Cai Xiang 蔡襄[Cai4 Xiang1]
